main.name: Dharmesh Kumar
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe JS
main.bio: Hi there! I am dharmesh and I love developing a progressive and user-centric applications where I can make the most of my love of technology and my knowledge of user-centred development techniques. My passion for learning and my involvement in web development will help me in optimizing web functionalities that improve data retrieval, workflow efficiencies and deliver work on time.

education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours - Best Outgoing Student of the batch (2014 - 2018)

work.company: Infinijith Apps & Technologies Pvt Ltd - CBE
work.title: Web Developer Trainee
work.description: I've worked on Node JS v8.9.4, React JS v16.0 as a trainee and I hope that I did my best and full potential in learning and developing things.

work.company: Infinijith Apps & Technologies Pvt Ltd - CBE
work.title: Web Developer Intern
work.description: Learnt javascript frameworks such as React Js, API integration using Node, and Database such as MySQL, MongoDB as an intern and my self-learning skills helped me a lot to learn more things.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Completed courses such as loT. Python for Data Science, NLP, Machine Learning through EdX portal and mentored over 30 students for their loT projects and helping them to learn courses.

skills.name: CSS & UI (Bootstrap, Material UI, Tailwind CSS)

testimonials.text: Developing with Dharmesh has been AWESOME, he makes developing React so easy and approachable!

Dharmesh is one of the best among all the people I have ever worked with. As I remember, Dharmesh was a very productive person, is hardworking, broad-minded and forward thinking individual. Intelligent, ambitious, energetic and proactive perfectionist. Desire for proficiency and education makes Dharmesh a valuable asset to the team. Working with Dharmesh is a signature of success.
